mapper.insert: insert into block_rule ( farm_id, batch_no, area, spec, unit_price, `number`, `type`, description, lease_unit, max_lease, create_time, validity_begin, validity_end, update_time, proxy ) values ( #{farmId}, #{batchNo}, #{area}, #{spec}, #{unitPrice}, #{number}, #{type}, #{description}, #{leaseUnit}, #{maxLease}, #{createTime}, #{validityBegin}, #{validityEnd}, #{updateTime}, #{proxy} )
mapper.select: select id, farm_id, batch_no, spec, unit_price, `number`, `type`, description, lease_unit, max_lease, create_time, validity_begin, validity_end, update_time, (select count(*) from block_detail as a where `status` = 1 and a.branch_no = b.batch_no) as has_lease from block_rule as b where farm_id = #{id} and NOW() BETWEEN validity_begin and validity_end
select distinct CONCAT(max_lease,'å¹´') from block_rule where farm_id = #{id}
select DISTINCT (spec) from block_rule where farm_id = #{id}
select count(id) from block_detail where branch_no = #{batchNo} and status = 0
select a.* from farm_manager a join farm b on a.fm_id = b.fm_id join block_rule c on b.id = c.farm_id where c.batch_no = #{batchNo} limit 1
